Name: Asian Ginger Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Lightly spiced with ginger, distinctly oriental in character.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2004 by Chris Langan of Barnomadics.
